en.title: Kitten Weight Management: Recording Tips and Growth Guidelines
en.content:
A kitten's weight is an important indicator of their health. By recording it regularly, you can quickly identify whether growth is on track and catch any health issues early.

How to Weigh Your Kitten

A kitchen scale works well for this purpose. Place the kitten in a small container and weigh them. Weighing at the same time of day each time makes comparison easier. Record the weight once or twice a week.

Signs of Healthy Growth

A healthy kitten gains approximately 10-15 grams per day. If the weight remains unchanged or decreases over a week, it may indicate nutritional deficiency or health problems, so consult your veterinarian.

Weight Management at Fuluck Cattery

At Fuluck Cattery, we regularly record the weight of all our kittens and monitor their healthy growth. If you have concerns about weight changes after bringing your kitten home, feel free to reach out to us via LINE.

zh.title: 幼猫体重管理：健康成长的记录方法与参考标准
zh.content:
幼猫的体重是健康的晴雨表。通过定期记录，可以及早了解生长是否顺利以及是否存在健康问题。

体重测量方法

使用厨房秤（烹饪用精密秤）非常方便。将幼猫放入小容器中称量。每次在相同的时间段测量更便于比较。建议每周记录1-2次。

健康成长的信号

健康的幼猫每天大约增重10-15克。如果一周内体重没有变化或出现下降，可能存在营养不足或身体不适的问题，请咨询兽医。

福楽猫舍的体重管理

福楽猫舍会对所有幼猫进行日常体重记录，持续监测其健康成长情况。接猫回家后如果对体重变化有疑虑，欢迎通过LINE咨询我们。
